headline: Garmin : announces Cirrus Perspective+ flight deck upgrade for SR Series G3 and G5 aircraft
summary: OLATHE, Kan./July 10, 2025 - Garmin today announced upcoming Supplemental Type Certificate approval of the Cirrus Perspective+™ flight deck upgrade for SR Series G3 and G5 aircraft. The...
